last_episode_to_air.name: Octi Gone
last_episode_to_air.overview: Professor Utonium is hosting a party for all the rich and famous people in Townsville, so Bubbles makes sure that she is the most beautiful of the girls by continually grooming herself. While doing this, she notices one of Octi's legs poking out from under the girls' bed, so she goes to pick him up to find that all that's there is one of Octi's legs! After waking up from the shock, she vows to exact revenge on the person who 'killed' Octi.

name: The Powerpuff Girls
overview: The Powerpuff Girls is a animated television series about Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup, three kindergarten-aged girls with superpowers, as well as their "father", the brainy scientist Professor Utonium, who all live in the fictional city of Townsville, USA. The girls are frequently called upon by the town's childlike and naive mayor to help fight nearby criminals using their powers.

episodes.name: Monkey See, Doggie Do
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo unleashes a curse that turns everyone into dogs, including the Powerpuff Girls, but the three sniff out a solution and show Mojo Jojo that their bite is worse than his bark.

episodes.name: Mommy Fearest
episodes.overview: Professor Utonium falls head-over-heels in love for the lovely Ima Goodlady. Unfortunately, she's really the sinister Sedusa, out to keep the Girls grounded for the first time ever while she commits crimes around Townsville, such as making off with the Mayor's jewels.

episodes.name: Insect Inside
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls hate roaches. Roach Coach uses this to his advantage to take over Townsville. Can the Powerpuff Girls overcome their fear of roaches?

episodes.name: Powerpuff Bluff
episodes.overview: After putting 3 criminals to jail those 3 criminals dress up as the Powerpuff Girls. Spreading crime wherever they go these impostors ruin the girls' reputation.

episodes.name: Octi Evil
episodes.overview: The heinous Him toys with Bubbles' mind by speaking to her through Octi, her favorite stuffed animal. Following Octi/Him's instructions, Bubbles provokes a fight between her sisters that prompts the Professor to issue a time-out until the Girls can make amends and make squid meat out of the giant, Him-controlled Octi.

episodes.name: Geshundfight
episodes.overview: The Amoeba Boys' ill-conceived plan to stand in front of the "Keep off the Grass" sign at Townsville Park all night in the rain leaves them with a terrible virus. When they infect the Townsville population, it's up to the Girls to find the antidote.

episodes.name: Buttercrush
episodes.overview: Buttercup becomes smitten with Ace, the leader of the Ganggreen Gang. However, when the gang exploits her infatuation and lures Blossom and Bubbles into danger, Buttercup quickly comes to her sisters' rescue and shows the boys the real meaning of the word "crush."

episodes.name: Fuzzy Logic
episodes.overview: A squirrel trespasses on Fuzzy Lumpkins private property. Fuzzy chases him all the way into Townsville and goes crazy hurting all the citizens that stand in his way.

episodes.name: Boogie Frights
episodes.overview: When all the lights go out at night the Boogie Man and his monsters come out to boogie all night long.

episodes.name: Abracadaver
episodes.overview: The Mayor tells the girls' a story about a famous magician who died by a trick with a laughing audience. Now the magician has come back to life to take out his revenge.

episodes.name: Telephonies
episodes.overview: The Ganggreen Gang gets hold of the Mayor's hotline to the Powerpuff Girls and makes prank calls, sending the Girls on a wild goose chase all over town. However, when it's the notorious villain's Mojo Jojo, Fuzzy, and Him that the gang disturbs, they learn the price of making prank calls.

episodes.name: Tough Love
episodes.overview: The citizens of Townsville loves The Powerpuff Girls and its annoying Him, so Him turns everyone's love for the Powerpuff Girls into hate.

episodes.name: Major Competition
episodes.overview: There's a new man in town: Major Man, an impossibly perfect superhero who cuts in on the Girls' turf. Unfortunately, Major Man isn't as perfect as he is supposed to be as the girls soon discover, and come up with an idea to make Major Man reveal the fraud that he is in the midst of a monster attack.

episodes.name: Mr. Mojo's Rising
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo kidnaps the Professor in a plot to steal the girls' powers when they arrive.

episodes.name: Paste Makes Waste
episodes.overview: Buttercup teases paste-eating classmate Elmer. When a fly with atomic chemicals enters the paste, Elmer turns into a destructive Paste Monster. Buttercup has to get out of a sticky situation by doing something against her tough nature—apologizing.

episodes.name: Ice Sore
episodes.overview: On a very hot and humid day Blossom discovers that she has ice powers.

episodes.name: Bubblevicious
episodes.overview: Bubbles is tired of people dismissing her as more sugar than spice. When she sets out to prove she's hardcore, she takes everyone by surprise, even Mojo Jojo.

episodes.name: The Bare Facts
episodes.overview: Mojo kidnaps the Mayor and the Powerpuff Girls rescue him, but when the Mayor tries to get the story out of them each Powerpuff Girl has their own version.

episodes.name: Cat Man Do
episodes.overview: Bubbles saves a seemingly innocent little cat from the clutches of an evil villain, but when the Girls discover it's actually the Cat who is evil, they must save the Professor from becoming the "purr-fect" victim.

episodes.name: Impeach Fuzz
episodes.overview: The Mayor creates a commotion in Townsville about being re-elected as Mayor again, but he wakes up Fuzzy Lumpkins who get's annoyed. The people like Fuzzy and vote him Mayor.

episodes.name: Just Another Manic Mojo
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls play baseball and the ball goes into Mojo's home. They ask him to look for the ball, but Mojo takes advantage of the situation and tries to destroy them.

episodes.name: Mime for a Change
episodes.overview: A clown get's hit by a bleach truck and turns into an evil mime.

episodes.name: The Rowdyruff Boys
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo creates the ultimate weapons against the Powerpuff Girls. They're Brick, Boomer, and Butch: The Rowdyruff Boys, male equivalents. When regular fighting doesn't work against the Boys, the Girls have to use their feminine wiles to seal a victory.

episodes.name: Uh Oh Dynamo
episodes.overview: Worried about the Girls' safety, the Professor creates Powerpuff Dynamo, a state-of-the-art giant robot, to help them in battle. When a dynamite duel breaks out between Dynamo and a Giant Fish Balloon Monster, a parody of Godzilla or Gamera, Little Tokyo, Townsville is the stage of an explosive battle.

episodes.name: Stuck Up, Up, And Away
episodes.overview: New student Princess Morebucks comes to Pokey Oaks kindergarten and after seeing The Powerpuff Girls in action she decides to become one.

episodes.name: Schoolhouse Rocked
episodes.overview: After being arrested by a truant officer, the Gang Green Gang goes back to kindergarten and invades Pokey Oaks with tricks up their sleeves.

episodes.name: Collect Her
episodes.overview: Nerd boy Lenny Baxter has every single Powerpuff merchandise on the entire planet and now he decides to collect The Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: Supper Villain
episodes.overview: Next door neighbor Harold Smith can't stand the Powerpuff Girls so he creates a super villain identity to beat the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: The Professor throws the girls a birthday party, but when every villain finds out about it they try to ruin the party.

episodes.name: Too Pooped To Puff
episodes.overview: The citizens of Townsville take advantage of the Powerpuff Girls and the girls' go out on a strike.

episodes.name: Beat Your Greens
episodes.overview: Alien broccoloids infect the broccoli of Townsville and now it's up to all the kids in Townsville(including the Powerpuff Girls) to defeat them.

episodes.name: Down n' Dirty
episodes.overview: Buttercup loves to fight monsters but taking a bath gets in the way, so to continue fighting monsters she doesn't take a bath for 3 days.

episodes.name: Dream Scheme
episodes.overview: Putting everyone in the world asleep can be a hard job so to make it easier Sandman puts the world to sleep forever.

episodes.name: You Snooze You Lose
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo creates the perfect plan to destroying The Powerpuff Girls ever, but because of an open window in his home Mojo's plan's fall into the Amoeba Boys' hands.

episodes.name: Slave The Day
episodes.overview: Big Billy from the Gang Green Gang gets saved from the train tracks by The Powerpuff Girls. Now he becomes their slave for life.

episodes.name: Los Dos Mojos
episodes.overview: Bubbles gets hit on the head by Mojo and gets amnesia.

episodes.name: A Very Special Blossom
episodes.overview: Blossom steals a set of $2000 golf clubs for Father's Day for the Professor.

episodes.name: Daylight Savings
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls save the day before and after their bedtime, and by the time they're at school they always sleep in class. Annoyed by this Ms. Keane talks to the Professor and he gives them a curfew.

episodes.name: Mo Job
episodes.overview: Princess Morebucks hires Mojo Jojo to think up a brilliant plan to gain the Powerpuff's powers and destroy the Powerpuff Girls along with it.

episodes.name: Pet Feud
episodes.overview: The Professor creates a pet for the girls' that can only be fed once!

episodes.name: Imaginary Fiend
episodes.overview: A new kid at Pokey Oaks named Mike Believe is very unpopular with his classmates, so he creates an imaginary friend for himself who turns out to be an imaginary friend.

episodes.name: Cootie Gras
episodes.overview: Harry Pitt has the cooties and everyone in Pokey Oaks are avoiding him including the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: The Powerpuff Girls Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever
episodes.overview: A rainy day in Townsville becomes boring for the citizens of Townsville, so the Powerpuff Girls make the best out of a terrible rainy day.

episodes.name: Just Desserts
episodes.overview: Harold Smith finally gets paroled out of jail, and when he comes back to his adoring family they end up hating the Powerpuff Girls just as much as he does. Equipped with all sorts of high tech weapons the Smith's take their revenge out on the Utonium family.

episodes.name: Twisted Sister
episodes.overview: To pooped out from fighting crime all the time the Powerpuff Girls create a 4th Powerpuff Girl named Bunny.

episodes.name: Cover Up
episodes.overview: The tough Buttercup's secret is revealed when her sister's learn that Buttercup's source of power is her little green blankie.

episodes.name: Speed Demon
episodes.overview: After a long week of school, the girls get a long weekend to go to the Bahamas. Buttercup dares them to race home and when they do they travel 50 years into the future.

episodes.name: Mojo Jonesin'
episodes.overview: The kids at Pokey Oaks really like The Powerpuff Girls, so Mojo gives a few kids a dose of chemical X.

episodes.name: Something's A Ms.
episodes.overview: Ms. Bellum seduces the Mayor to get some time off, but when something seems a miss the Powerpuff Girls investigate the situation.

episodes.name: Slumbering With The Enemy
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls throw a slumber party and invites every girl in their school to come. By the time they give their invitation out to the last girl Mojo steals it and comes to the party dressed up as Mojesha.

episodes.name: Fallen Arches
episodes.overview: Old supervillains break out of the retirement home, and the Powerpuff Girls get old superheroes out of retirement to beat them.

episodes.name: The Mane Event
episodes.overview: Bubbles and Buttercup do Blossom's hair, but when it gets tangled they give Blossom a bad hair day.

episodes.name: Town And Out
episodes.overview: The Professor gets a new job, and the Utonium family moves to the Town Of Citysville. The Professor loves it, but the girls don't and are having a hard time adjusting to the new changes.

episodes.name: Child Fearing
episodes.overview: The Professor has to go out to an award's ceremony. He forgets to call the babysitter so he calls the Mayor who calls up Mojo Jojo to babysit.

episodes.name: Criss Cross Crisis
episodes.overview: The Professor gets a new job, and the Utonium family moves to the Town Of Citysville. The Professor loves it, but the girls' don't and are having a hard time to adjust to the new changes.

episodes.name: Bubblevision
episodes.overview: Bubbles has problems seeing, so she's forced to wear glasses.

episodes.name: Bought and Scold
episodes.overview: Princess buys Townsville and makes crime legal.

episodes.name: Gettin' Twiggy With It
episodes.overview: Ms. Keane assigns pet duty since it's Friday. The Powerpuff Girls volunteer, but she chooses Mitch to take care of Twiggy, the class hamster.

episodes.name: Cop Out
episodes.overview: A lazy cop named Mike Bricoski lets his other fellow cops do the dirty work for him, but when he gets fired he takes his revenge out on the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: Three Girls And A Monster
episodes.overview: Blossom and Buttercup have an argument thinking that brains or brawn is the best way to destroy a monster.

episodes.name: Monkey See, Doggy Two
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo turns the world into dogs again. The Powerpuff Girls come to the rescue wondering why Mojo does the same plan again. He tells them that he's found a fatal flaw in his old plan as he watches a video of his old plan.

episodes.name: Jewel Of The Aisle
episodes.overview: A dumb crook hides a jewel in a cereal box. He searches all 3000 of them and when he's down to his last one the Professor buys it for the girls'.

episodes.name: Super Zeroes
episodes.overview: After some inspiration from their favorite comics Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup try to become better heroes.

episodes.name: Candy Is Dandy
episodes.overview: When the Mayor rewards the Powerpuff Girls with candy for saving the day the girls ask Mojo to commit more crimes, so they can get more candy.

episodes.name: Catastrophe
episodes.overview: An unbeatable slime monster comes to Townsville.

episodes.name: Hot Air Buffoon
episodes.overview: The Mayor gets sick and tired of the Powerpuff Girls saving the day so he decides to save the day by himself.

episodes.name: Ploys R' Us
episodes.overview: The Professor sleepwalks and steals toys at the same time. When the girls' find this out they have fun taking advantage of the situation.

episodes.name: The Headsucker's Moxy
episodes.overview: A new villain steals valuable information from smart people in Townsville, so the Powerpuff Girls use the Mayor as his new target.

episodes.name: Equal Fights
episodes.overview: A female villain named Femme Fatale teaches the girls' to be sexist, so she can get away with crimes.

episodes.name: Powerprof.
episodes.overview: The Professor tries to spend time with his daughters, but they fight crime to much. To solve the problem the Professor creates a power suit, so he could fight crime and spend time with the girls'.

episodes.name: Moral Decay
episodes.overview: After receiving a dollar from the Professor, Buttercup gets hooked and steals other people's teeth for the tooth fairy.

episodes.name: Meet The Beat Alls
episodes.overview: Mojo Jojo, Princess Morebucks, Fuzzy Lumpkins, and Him all team up as The Beat Alls to defeat the Powerpuff Girls. All is going well until Mojo Jojo falls in love with Moko Jono who breaks up the Beat Alls.

episodes.name: Helter Shelter
episodes.overview: Bubbles loves animals and the Professor is sick of her bringing them home, but when she brings home a baby whale the girls try to hide him before the Professor comes home.

episodes.name: Power Lunch
episodes.overview: The Gang Green Gang raids a mini mart eating all types of foods. When the Powerpuff Girls arrive they use their heat vision which causes a chain reaction which gives the Gang Green Gang super powers.

episodes.name: Him Diddle Riddle
episodes.overview: Him has given the girls a set of nine riddles to solve in a time limit. The various tasks test both the girls' physical and mental faculties. However, if they fail to complete them all on time, Him promises them that "the Professor will pay".

episodes.name: Film Flam
episodes.overview: A sleazy director comes to Townsville to make a movie about the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: All Chalked Up
episodes.overview: Buttercup smashes Bubbles's chalk when her drawings cover the playground's blacktop.  An angry Bubbles is given magic chalk by Him (disguised as a butterfly) and encouraged to express her anger in her drawings.

episodes.name: Get Back Jojo
episodes.overview: It's career day at Pokey Oaks and the Professor comes with a time machine and explains how he got into science and created the Powerpuff Girls.

guest_stars.character: Science Teacher / Schoolgirl #1 / Young Ms. Bellum (voice)
guest_stars.name: Julie Nathanson

episodes.name: Members Only
episodes.overview: The girls try to join the superhero organization, the Justice Friends, but they must prove themselves to do so by tests of strength, speed, and smarts. But the only flaw about the organization is it doesn't allow "little girls" into the group and it's centered around men. However, when an enemy attacks the organization, the girls must come to their rescue.

episodes.name: Nano Of The North
episodes.overview: Microscopic rain creatures eat away at Townsville.

episodes.name: Stray Bullet
episodes.overview: Alien invaders invade Townsville, and the Powerpuff Girls go to Mojo for help.

episodes.name: Forced Kin
episodes.overview: Alien invaders invade Townsville, and the Powerpuff Girls go to Mojo for help.

episodes.name: Knock It Off
episodes.overview: The Professor's old buddy and roommate from college Dick Hardly comes for a visit. When he sees the Powerpuff Girls he comes up with a scheme to make more of them and sell them as a security system.

episodes.name: Superfriends
episodes.overview: A new neighbor named Robin tries to make friends with the Powerpuff Girls, but its hard when they have to save the day all the time. Robin gets sad and makes a new friend: Princess Morebucks.

episodes.name: Keen On Keane
episodes.overview: It's Valentine's day and The Powerpuff Girls try to hook up Ms.Keane and the Professor together.

episodes.name: Not So Awesome Blossom
episodes.overview: After losing a battle with Mojo's robots (which Buttercup defeats) Blossom suddenly becomes a jinx and starts messing up everything.

episodes.name: Power-Noia
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls have to overcome their greatest fears after Him has brought them to life.

episodes.name: Monstra-city
episodes.overview: When the Mayor finds the deed to Monster Isle the monsters move to Townsville causing havoc between monsters and humans.

episodes.name: Shut The Pup Up
episodes.overview: After witnessing a crime, Talking Dog stays at the Powerpuff Girls house for a while as part of a witness protection program.

episodes.name: Toast Of The Town
episodes.overview: When the Mayor gets a craving for toast he discovers his toaster is broken so he gives it to the Professor to fix, but he accidentally discovers the Professor's secret stash of chemical X which the Mayor uses as a hair growth formula.

episodes.name: Divide And Conquer
episodes.overview: After stealing a tangerine (orange) and watching it split up into different pieces the Amoeba Boys learn how to multiply and make duplicates of themselves.

episodes.name: Burglar Alarmed
episodes.overview: The girls realize that the Professor is tired after preparing for his dissertation tomorrow, so when a burglar new to Townsville tries to rob them the girls try to stop him without waking up the Professor.

episodes.name: Shotgun Wedding
episodes.overview: The Professor tries to figure out just what kind of species Fuzzy Lumpkins is, but when he accidentally gets covered in mud and flowers it makes him look like a Lumpkin which Fuzzy falls in love with and tries to marry.

episodes.name: Save Mojo
episodes.overview: When the Powerpuff Girls try to stop Mojo from doing a crime an animal activist group comes to his rescue protesting that the Powerpuff Girls can't harm him because he's an endangered animal.

episodes.name: Substitute Creature
episodes.overview: When Ms. Keane gets sick she hires a substitute teacher named Mr.Green to run the class in her absence. Unfortunately because of his monstrous appearance the girls assume he's a bad guy and try to save their classmates from him.

episodes.name: The Boys Are Back In Town
episodes.overview: Him is sick and tired of all the villains (including himself) failing in their never-ending plot to destroy the Powerpuff Girls, so he brings the Rowdyruff Boys back to life and stronger than ever.

episodes.name: See Me, Feel Me, Gnomey
episodes.overview: In this musical, the girls are outmatched by Townsville's villains. They turn to Gnomey to bring peace to Townsville in exchange for their powers, but, when the city falls under the rule of Communism, it's up to the girls to stop him.

episodes.name: Pee Pee G's
episodes.overview: The girls wake up to discover their bed is wet. Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup all deny the incident, but they still wonder who did it. This destroys their confidence.

episodes.name: Boy Toys
episodes.overview: Princess interrupts a battle between the Powerpuff Girls and the Rowdyruff Boys. She tries to join the Rowdyruff Boys but they reject her, so out of pity the girls let Princess become a Powerpuff Girl.

episodes.name: Seed No Evil
episodes.overview: The owner of the Townsville Museum accidentally thaws out a prehistoric caveman criminal that was frozen in a block of ice.

episodes.name: City of Clipsville
episodes.overview: While cleaning out their closet the Powerpuff Girls reminisce on all the adventures they've had over the years.

episodes.name: Lying Around The House
episodes.overview: After the Professor lies to the girls to avoid spending time with them a little white lie monster develops.

episodes.name: Bubble Boy
episodes.overview: When Ms. Keane gets sick she hires a substitute teacher named Mr.Green to run the class in her absence. Unfortunately because of his monstrous appearance the girls assume he's a bad guy and try to save their classmates from him.

episodes.name: The Powerpuff Girls: A Documentary
episodes.overview: He is sick and tired of all the villains (including himself) failing in their never-ending plot to destroy the Powerpuff Girls, so he brings the Rowdyruff Boys back to life and stronger than ever.

episodes.name: Girls Gone Mild
episodes.overview: When and organization called Parents Against Powerpuffs tell the Girls that their super-heroics are becoming too imitable for children, the Girls must hold back on fighting crime.

episodes.name: Curses
episodes.overview: When Bubbles overhears the Professor saying some bad words, the Girls add a whole new slew of adjectives to their vocabulary.

episodes.name: Bang For Your Buck
episodes.overview: When the Girls and the Gangreen Gang discover a destructo ray for sale at Mojo's Yard Sale, each team sets out to see who can earn the most money and buy it first.

episodes.name: Silent Treatment
episodes.overview: The Professor tries to teach the girls all about the history of silent movies and how they're much better than the movies of today by taking them to one.

episodes.name: Sweet 'N' Sour
episodes.overview: A new group of criminals, which is a group of cute little animals robs Townsville blind. The girls try to stop them, but because of their innocent looks the animal criminals have the advantage.

episodes.name: Prime Mates
episodes.overview: Back when Mojo Jojo tried to take over the world with primates, there was one monkey who didn't get his due - Mopey Popo. Now Mopey is back to try and be evil just as Mojo intended.

episodes.name: Coupe D'Etat
episodes.overview: When the Professor tries out his car, the Girls realize that this K.A.R.R. is taking the Professor away from them, both figuratively and literally.

episodes.name: Makes Zen To Me
episodes.overview: After beating up Fuzzy Lumpkins and other villains to a bloody pulp Blossom and Bubbles start to think that there sister goes a little bit too far when it comes to fighting crime.

episodes.name: Say Uncle
episodes.overview: The Professor tells the girls all about his younger brother Eugene and how he was such a wild man back in the day.

episodes.name: Reeking Havoc
episodes.overview: The Professor is anxious to win the 2nd Townsville Annual Cook-off competition this year.

episodes.name: Live & Let Dynamo
episodes.overview: Dynamo returns and this time is against Townsville and destroying the town along with terrorizing it's citizens.

episodes.name: Mo' Linguish
episodes.overview: Mojo is sentenced to do community service for Townsville and begins teaching English at the Learning Annex.

episodes.name: Oops, I Did It Again
episodes.overview: When the Professor realizes that all his successful experiments are actually just accidents, he sets out to do something brilliant on purpose!

episodes.name: A Made Up Story
episodes.overview: Someone is defacing all the posters and statues of Townsville with make-up.

episodes.name: Little Miss Interprets
episodes.overview: When the Girls hear the Professor trying to make something out of sugar, spice, and everything nice, they are sure he's trying to create new little girls.

episodes.name: Night Mayor
episodes.overview: The Mayor keeps having the same dream over and over again, but he never sees the end. Now it's up Girls to go into the Mayor's head and solve this mystery.

episodes.name: Custody Battle
episodes.overview: When Mojo discovers that the Rowdyruff Boys have returned, he competes with Him to determine who's the more evil father.

episodes.name: City Of Nutsville
episodes.overview: One day during a picnic Bubbles get stung in her mouth by a bee. After a visit by the doctor she is forbidden to speak for a week. Suddenly when all the squirrels in Townsville get mad, Blossom and Buttercup are unable to do anything without Bubbles special ability. Now it's up to Bubbles and Bullet to stop this crime.

episodes.name: Aspirations
episodes.overview: The Ganggreen Gang is committing brilliant crimes for Sedusa so she can get her revenge on the girls for making her bald.

episodes.name: That's Not My Baby
episodes.overview: The girls rescue a baby from a monster and are forced to care for it when they can't find its mother.

episodes.name: Simian Says
episodes.overview: "Custody Battle" Mojo discovers that the Rowdyruff Boys are back and is determined to show them that he is a more evil dad than Him.

episodes.name: Sun Scream
episodes.overview: The girls get bad sunburns.

episodes.name: City Of Frownsville
episodes.overview: Lou Gubrious sets a crying ray on Townsville.

episodes.name: West In Pieces
episodes.overview: Professor Utomium sends the Steamypuff Girls to save the western town of Townsville from Mojo the Kid.

episodes.name: Crazy Mixed Up Puffs
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls must literally work as one to try and stop Mojo Jojo from destroying Townsville.

episodes.name: Mizzen In Action
episodes.overview: Captain Crack McGraigen and his crew are tossed forward in time.

episodes.name: Roughing It Up
episodes.overview: The Powerpuff Girls and the Professor set on an old-fashioned vacation to the Townsville Swamp. Trouble is, Fuzzy and his nephews are there too.

episodes.name: What's the Big Idea?
episodes.overview: Twenty stories tall, The Powerpuff Girls spell disaster for Townsville when they delicately try to stop Mojo Jojo from taking over.

episodes.name: Nuthin' Special
episodes.overview: Buttercup feels left out when she realizes that she doesn't have any special powers like her sisters.

episodes.name: Neighbor Hood
episodes.overview: When a TV show convinces kids to send in money to enter a special contest, Bubbles and the rest of the kids in the neighbor hood raise money to enter it.

episodes.name: I See A Funny Cartoon In Your Future
episodes.overview: A medium named Madame Argentina, and her side-kick, Fred the duck (he really is a duck) attempt to steal money from Townsville's citizens by offering to contact a dead relative for them.

episodes.name: Octi Gone
episodes.overview: Professor Utonium is hosting a party for all the rich and famous people in Townsville, so Bubbles makes sure that she is the most beautiful of the girls by continually grooming herself. While doing this, she notices one of Octi's legs poking out from under the girls' bed, so she goes to pick him up to find that all that's there is one of Octi's legs! After waking up from the shock, she vows to exact revenge on the person who 'killed' Octi.
